Description:

A decade later, a series of role-playing game Might & Magic  
returns undergone fundamental changes gameplay and gain new 
abilities. Of course, this is the best role-playing game in 
its genre!
After the shocking events Might & Magic Heroes VI you will 
have many adventures in the company of four heroes. You will 
enjoy the whirlpool of political intrigue, flared Kartal and 
its surroundings. For power in the city, ready to declare its 
independence, fighting several factions. The city's fate depends 
on you!
Might & Magic X Legacy - an adventure for one player in the best 
traditions of classic role-playing games in the first person.
Create a squad from scratch, spend it on a huge open world, 
fight the mighty fabulous creatures in ancient magical treasures.

Features:

Immerse yourself in the classic atmosphere of Might & Magic : 
reopen series that defined the development of role-playing games 
in the 80s of the last century! Classic, timeless, returns after 
eleven years of waiting. The game supports the traditions of the 
past, meeting all standards of modern games. Old school game is 
conducted under the new rules!
Lead a team of four characters, each of which may belong to one 
of the four races. The game is available twelve classes of characters 
with their own unique systems development. Offers thousands of combinations!
Develop your tactics in turn-based battles you will go face to face 
with a variety of unique enemies and bosses. Perform tasks, develop 
opportunities squad, produced new artifacts.
Open a new part: Agin explore the peninsula, a whole new area of the 
universe Might & Magic, which has not yet set foot noble heroes. Epic 
scenery and the locals will not fail to surprise you ...
Create modification and share with your friends: you can create and 
submit to the court their own community stories and tasks. This is 
your chance to make history!

Features repack

Might & Magic X - Legacy
